description: Details submitted in compliance with Condition (10) Landscaping of DC/14/89888 granted 9 April 2015, in connection with DC/16/098167 submitted under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 granted 27 October 2016, for the demolition of existing garages to the north of Longfield Crescent Estate, Longfield Crescent SE26, and the construction of nine, part two/part three storey 3 bed mews houses with associated front gardens and roof terraces, two, 4 storey blocks providing three 1 bedroom and four 2 bedroom self-contained flats, four, 3 bedroom two storey plus roof space dwelling-houses and associated gardens together with the provision of children's play spaces, a new shared street running east to west towards the south of the site and landscaping works including a pedestrian pathway, hydraulic bollards and associated works.
site_name: LONGFIELD CRESCENT ESTATE, LONGFIELD CRESCENT, LONDON, SE26
